pli-tv-bu-vb-np5:2.10.1: _Cīvara_ means both a finished robe and any cloth that can be used to make a robe. Thus I vary my translation depending on the context.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np5:3.1.10: The six are linen, cotton, silk, wool, sunn hemp, and hemp; see [](pli-tv-kd8:3.1.6). | According to [](pli-tv-kd8:21.1.4) this is no smaller than 8 by 4 _sugataṅgula_, “standard fingerbreadths”.
